mapper.select: select ID,MBR_ID,MOVE_NUM,CREATE_TIME from APP_PRENATAL_FETAL_MOVEMENT_RECORD where ID = #{ id}
mapper.insert: insert into APP_PRENATAL_FETAL_MOVEMENT_RECORD (ID,MBR_ID,MOVE_NUM,CREATE_TIME) values ( #{ id, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ mbrId, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ moveNum, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ createTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update APP_PRENATAL_FETAL_MOVEMENT_RECORD set MBR_ID = #{ mbrId, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOVE_NUM = #{ moveNum, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{ createTime, javaType=Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{ id}
